product_overview: TaskMaster is a mobile task management application designed specifically for Indonesian university students to organize their academic tasks, notes, and schedules in one integrated platform.
core_goals: Provide a comprehensive task management system for academic activities
Help students prioritize their work based on urgency and importance
Deliver automatic reminders for task deadlines
Integrate academic schedules within a single application
key_features: Task Management with types (Kuliah and Non-Kuliah), statuses (TODO, PROGRESS, DONE), and priorities (LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH)
Detailed task attributes including course name, submission type, links, notes, and deadline tracking
Note Management with create, read, update, delete functionalities and category organization
Schedule Management featuring types like Kuliah, UTS, UAS, and custom events with recurring options
Category System for organizing tasks and notes with custom colors
Notification System for reminders before deadlines and schedule start, supporting push notifications and permission handling
Data Export feature allowing users to backup and share their data
Home Dashboard showing an overview of todayâ€™s tasks, deadlines, quick add actions, and task statistics
Settings for notification preferences, theme, data management, and app info
user_flow_summary: Add New Task: Tap 'Tambah Tugas', select task type, fill details with optional course data, select category, save, and see the task in the list
Complete Task: View task list, tap or swipe to cycle status from TODO to DONE, record completion timestamp
View Calendar: Navigate to calendar tab, view weekly or monthly schedule, tap dates to see event details
validation_criteria: Task creation and editing works with required fields and reflects correctly in the task list
Notifications are delivered timely per task deadlines and schedules
Data is persisted reliably locally in SQLite without loss during crashes
Calendar shows correct recurring and one-time events
UI is fully localized in Indonesian with correct date and day formatting
Application performs smoothly meeting launch time and scrolling requirements
CRUD operations for tasks, notes, and schedules are verified through unit and integration testing
